tfidf_vector = TfidfVectorizer(sublinear_tf=True, min_df=5, norm='l2', encoding='latin-1', ngram_range=(1, 2), tokenizer=spacy_tokenizer)
from sklearn.model_selection import GridSearchCV
C = np.logspace(-4, 4, 50)
parameters = dict(classifier__C=C)

classifier2 = LogisticRegression(solver="lbfgs", random_state=72, n_jobs=-, max_iter=5000)

# Create pipeline
pipe = Pipeline([('vectorizer', tfidf_vector),
               ('classifier', classifier2)])

clf = GridSearchCV(pipe, parameters)
clf.fit(X_train, y_train)
sorted(clf.cv_results_.keys())
['mean_fit_time',
 'mean_score_time',
 'mean_test_score',
 'param_classifier__C',
 'params',
 'rank_test_score',
 'split0_test_score',
 'split1_test_score',
 'split2_test_score',
 'split3_test_score',
 'split4_test_score',
 'std_fit_time',
 'std_score_time',
 'std_test_score']

print(clf.cv_results_)
print('Best C:', clf.best_estimator_.get_params()['classifier__C'])
print(); print(clf.best_estimator_.get_params()['classifier'])
